title: 207 - Crowded Trades Are Unwinding And It's Time To Take Advantage (William Koldus)
description: William (Travis) and Brian discuss what the crowded trades appear to be in today's markets, what to be careful of, and what opportunities the market may currently be offering investors.
content:encoded: William (Travis) and Brian discuss what the crowded trades appear to be in today's markets, what to be careful of, and what opportunities the market may currently be offering investors.
